text: Derek Ross King (born 21 February 1962) is a Scottish television presenter, actor and writer. He is best known for being the Los Angeles weekday morning correspondent for ITV. King was honored in the 2018 New Year Honors by being named an MBE for services to Broadcasting, Arts and Charity. title: Ross King (presenter)
